Workflow.Name: Visitor Registration - When a Visit Registration record has been updated
Workflow.Description: This cloud flow triggers when there's a change to visitor's registration. It sends the appointment details and a PIN to the visitor, and the schedule to the host.

LocalizedName.description: Visitor Registration - When a Visit Registration record has been updated

Description.description: This cloud flow triggers when there's a change to visitor's registration. It sends the appointment details and a PIN to the visitor, and the schedule to the host.
